title: 1953년 Slifka 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Slifka. 판결일: 1953-06-09. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Puerto Rico Industrial Development Company v. Joseph Slifka
**판결일**: 1953-06-09
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 282 A.D. 663

## 판결문 요약


This is an action for a sum of money only, even as to the second cause of action based upon defendant’s fraud. As such, the warrant of attachment was properly issued. Order unanimously reversed, with $20 costs and disbursements to the appellant, and the motion denied. ¡Present — Peck, P. J., Glennon, Cohn, Callahan and Breitel, JJ.
...

sources.name: Harvard Law - Case Law Access Project
